pr_title: Add integration test for Helix Java APIs using different MSDS endpoints

timeline.message: Add integration test for Helix Java APIs using different MSDS endpoints

timeline.bodyText: Why? Consider using PropertyPathBuilder to avoid hard code?
timeline.author: jiajunwang

replies.bodyText: Or call it ROOT would be easier to understand.
replies.author: jiajunwang

replies.bodyText:
My initial thought was there are too many places that use slash so just wanted to make it a constant to reduce objects created.
PropertyPathBuilder doesn't cover all the cases/paths creation in this test
Slash does not only act as a root, but also a separator. So root does not satisfy very well.
Instead, I just leave the way slash is used as it is in the original code, but create a formPath() for my case.
replies.author: huizhilu

timeline.bodyText: Two "CLUSTER_3"s are defined separately. Not cool.
timeline.author: jiajunwang
